languages.text:
The Soldier immediately removes the winded effect. Until the end of combat, the Soldier gains the following {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}:
-<indent=5%>+10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.</indent>
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} becomes available after the Soldier kills 3 enemies. The kill counter is not reset between {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Солдат мгновенно избавляется от эффекта "восстановление дыхания" и до конца боя получает:
-<indent=5%>+10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90}% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическому урону{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g}.</indent>
Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} становится доступной после того, как солдат убьет 3 противников. Учитывается результат за несколько {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундов{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The Marksman gains
-<indent=5%>+10 Ballistic Skill</indent>
-<indent=5%>+<u>5+2×(AGI bonus)%</u> critical hit damage</indent>
-<indent=5%>+<u>(AGI bonus)%</u> critical hit chance</indent>
until the end of combat. The ability becomes available after the Marksman kills 3 enemies. The kill counter is not reset between rounds.

The Marksman immediately removes the winded effect and gains
-<indent=5%>+10 Ballistic Skill</indent>
-<indent=5%>+<u>(5 + 2 × AGI bonus)</u>% critical damage</indent>
-<indent=5%>+<u>AGI bonus</u>% critical hit chance</indent>
until the end of combat. This ability becomes available after the Marksman kills 3 enemies. The kill counter is not reset between rounds.

-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.</indent>
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} becomes available after the Soldier kills 3 enemies. The kill counter is not reset between {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} becomes available after the Marksman kills 3 enemies. The kill counter is not reset between {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Стрелок мгновенно избавляется от {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффекта{/g} "восстановление дыхания" и до конца боя получает:
-<indent=5%>+10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g})</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическому урону{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+<u>бонус ЛВК</u>% к шансу критического попадания</indent>
Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} становится доступной после того, как стрелок убьет 3 противников. Учитывается результат за несколько {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундов{/g}.

Стрелок мгновенно избавляется от {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффекта{/g} "восстановление дыхания" и до конца боя получает:
-<indent=5%>+10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g})</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическому урону{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+<u>бонус ЛВК</u>% к шансу критического попадания</indent>
Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} становится доступной после того, как стрелок убьет 3 противников. Учитывается результат за несколько {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундов{/g}.

Стрелок мгновенно избавляется от {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффекта{/g} "восстановление дыхания" и до конца боя получает:
-<indent=5%>+10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90}% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическому урону{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% к шансу критического попадания</indent>
Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} становится доступной после того, как стрелок убьет 3 противников. Учитывается результат за несколько {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундов{/g}.

languages.text:
士兵立刻消除疲惫{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}效果{/g}，并获得以下效果，效果持续至战斗结束：
- <indent=5%>+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90}%{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}%暴击率{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}。</indent>
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只有在士兵击杀3名敌人之后才能使用，击杀计数在新的一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始时不会重置。
languages.original_text:
The Soldier immediately removes the winded effect. Until the end of combat, the Soldier gains the following {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}:
-<indent=5%>+10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.</indent>
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} becomes available after the Soldier kills 3 enemies. The kill counter is not reset between {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
神射手立刻消除疲惫{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，并获得以下效果：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}提高10点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击伤害{/g}提高<u>（5+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}提高<u>敏捷加值</u>%。</indent>
这些效果持续至战斗结束。此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}技能{/g}只有在神射手击杀3名敌人之后才能使用。击杀计数在新的一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中不会重置。

神射手立刻消除疲惫{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，并获得以下效果：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}提高10点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击伤害{/g}提高{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90}%。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}提高{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}%。</indent>
这些效果持续至战斗结束。此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}技能{/g}只有在神射手击杀3名敌人之后才能使用。击杀计数在新的一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中不会重置。

languages.text:
兵士はマイナス効果を即座に取り除く。戦闘終了時まで、兵士は以下の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る：
-<indent=5%>+10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}。</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}。</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}。</indent>
この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は、兵士が敵3体を倒すと使用可能になる。また、{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとにキルカウンターはリセットされない。
languages.original_text:
The Soldier immediately removes the winded effect. Until the end of combat, the Soldier gains the following {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}:
-<indent=5%>+10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.</indent>
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} becomes available after the Soldier kills 3 enemies. The kill counter is not reset between {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
兵士はマイナス効果を即座に取り除く。戦闘終了時まで、兵士は以下の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る：
-<indent=5%>+10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}</indent>
この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は、兵士が敵3体を倒すと使用可能になる。また、{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとにキルカウンターはリセットされない。

マークスマンは即座に息切れ{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を取り除き、戦闘終了時まで
-<indent=5%>+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90}％{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルダメージ{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}％クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}</indent>
を獲得する。この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はマークスマンが敵を3体倒すと利用可能になる。{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}とラウンドの間でキル数はリセットされない。

languages.text:
El soldado elimina inmediatamente el estado de sin aliento. Hasta el final del combate, el soldado recibe las siguientes {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g}:
-<indent=5%>+10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico.</indent>
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} pasa a estar disponible cuando el soldado mata a 3 enemigos. El contador de muertes no se reinicia entre {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The Soldier immediately removes the winded effect. Until the end of combat, the Soldier gains the following {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}:
-<indent=5%>+10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.</indent>
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} becomes available after the Soldier kills 3 enemies. The kill counter is not reset between {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
El soldado elimina inmediatamente el estado de sin aliento. Hasta el final del combate, el soldado recibe las siguientes {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g}:
-<indent=5%>+10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico</indent>
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} pasa a estar disponible cuando el soldado mata a 3 enemigos. El contador de muertes no se reinicia entre {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.

El tirador de élite elimina de inmediato el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} sin aliento y gana
-<indent=5%> +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}daño crítico{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico</indent>
hasta el final del combate. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} puede usarse cuando el tirador mata a 3 enemigos. El contador no se reinicia entre {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.

languages.text:
Der Soldat hebt sofort den Effekt "Erschöpft" auf. Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhält der Soldat folgende {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g}:
-<indent=5%>+10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90} % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Schaden{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g}.</indent>
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} wird verfügbar, nachdem der Soldat 3 Feinde getötet hat. Der Killzähler wird zwischen den {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} nicht zurückgesetzt.
languages.original_text:
The Soldier immediately removes the winded effect. Until the end of combat, the Soldier gains the following {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}:
-<indent=5%>+10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.</indent>
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} becomes available after the Soldier kills 3 enemies. The kill counter is not reset between {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Soldat hebt sofort den Effekt „Erschöpft“ auf. Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhält der Soldat folgende {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g}: -<indent=5%>+10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}</indent> -<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90} % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Schaden{/g}</indent> -<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g}</indent> Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} wird verfügbar, nachdem der Soldat 3 Feinde getötet hat. Der Killzähler wird zwischen den {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} nicht zurückgesetzt.

Der Scharfschütze hebt sofort den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} erschöpft auf und erhält
-<indent=5%>+10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischer Schaden{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g}</indent>
bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} wird verfügbar, nachdem der Scharfschütze 3 Gegner getötet hat. Der Killzähler wird zwischen den {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} nicht zurückgesetzt.

languages.text:
Le soldat neutralise immédiatement l'effet Essoufflement. Jusqu'à la fin du combat, le soldat bénéficie des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus suivants{/g}:
-<indent=5%>+10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90}% de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g}.</indent>
Pour avoir accès à cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}, le soldat doit éliminer 3 ennemis. Le nombre d'éliminations n'est pas réinitialisé entre les {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The Soldier immediately removes the winded effect. Until the end of combat, the Soldier gains the following {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}:
-<indent=5%>+10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.</indent>
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} becomes available after the Soldier kills 3 enemies. The kill counter is not reset between {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Le soldat neutralise immédiatement l'effet Essoufflement. Jusqu'à la fin du combat, le soldat bénéficie des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus suivants{/g}:
-<indent=5%>+10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90}% de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g}.</indent>
Pour avoir accès à cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}, le soldat doit éliminer 3 ennemis. Le nombre d'éliminations n'est pas réinitialisé entre les {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

Le Tireur d'Élite neutralise immédiatement l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Essoufflement et acquiert :
- <indent=5%>+10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g}</indent>
- <indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}dégâts critiques{/g}</indent>
- <indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup critique{/g}</indent>
jusqu'à la fin du combat. Pour avoir accès à cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}, le Tueur d'Élite doit éliminer 3 ennemis. Le nombre d'éliminations n'est pas réinitialisé entre les {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

Le Soldat neutralise immédiatement l'effet Essoufflement. Jusqu'à la fin du combat, le Soldat bénéficie des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} suivants :
-<indent=5%>+10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances d'infliger un coup critique{/g}.</indent>
Pour avoir accès à cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}, le Soldat doit éliminer 3 ennemis. Le nombre d'éliminations n'est pas réinitialisé entre les {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text:
Asker'in üstündeki soluksuz kalma hâli anında kaybolur. Asker, çatışma sonuna dek şu {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslara{/g} sahip olur:
-<indent=5%>+10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+%{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik hasar{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+%{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g}.</indent>
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, Asker 3 düşman öldürdükten sonra kullanılabilir hâle gelir. Sözü edilen bu öldürme sayacı {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} geçişlerinde sıfırlanmaz.
languages.original_text:
The Soldier immediately removes the winded effect. Until the end of combat, the Soldier gains the following {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}:
-<indent=5%>+10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|BonusCritDamage|530b6d2cefef42f180b90c7bdbb99f90}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.</indent>
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} becomes available after the Soldier kills 3 enemies. The kill counter is not reset between {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
